title: Film3 Summit Returns to L.A. Alongside Streaming Festival With Theta
description: The live Film3 Summit will run alongside MetaFilm3 Fest, an on-chain festival powered by Theta that includes multiple film premieres.

title: Vitalik Buterin Ponders on Centralized Staking at ETH HK Hackathon
description:
Vitalik Buterin, a renowned co-founder of the second-largest crypto project, Ethereum, has raised critical discussions surrounding the challenges of the Ethereum proof-of-stake network. It included centralized staking and transaction processing efficiency alongside scaling issues of layer two. Buterin took the move during his presentation in the ongoing Ethereum Hong Kong Hackathon. The prominent Chinese report, […]

The post Vitalik Buterin Ponders on Centralized Staking at ETH HK Hackathon appeared first on Coin Edition.
